alert.note: Alert for Allendale; Hampton; Inland Jasper (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 7:08PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF HAMPTON, ALLENDALE AND JASPER COUNTIES... At 708 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm near Luray, or 7 miles southwest of Lake Warren State Park, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...strong winds 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar Indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Some locations in the path of this storm include... Hampton, Lake Warren State Park, Varnville, Estill, Gifford, Furman, Scotia, and Luray. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so. You can also email your report to nws.charlestonsc@noaa.gov.
